## Documentation

Comprehensive guides and references to help you get the most out of SkillMeat.

### Core Documentation

- [Getting Started Guide](docs/getting-started.md) - Installation, setup, and first steps
- [CLI Reference](docs/cli-reference.md) - Complete command documentation
- [API Reference](docs/api-reference.md) - REST API endpoints and schemas
- [Web UI Guide](docs/web-ui-guide.md) - Web interface features and workflows

### Development

- [Architecture Overview](docs/architecture.md) - System design and patterns
- [API Development](api/CLAUDE.md) - Backend development guide
- [Web Development](web/CLAUDE.md) - Frontend development guide
- [Testing Guide](docs/testing.md) - Testing strategies and patterns

### Advanced Topics

- [Sync & Conflict Resolution](docs/sync-guide.md) - Bidirectional sync workflows
- [Marketplace Publishing](docs/marketplace-guide.md) - Share your artifacts
- [MCP Integration](docs/mcp-guide.md) - Model Context Protocol servers
- [Security & Vault](docs/security-guide.md) - Credential management
